item.title: Pusing data to tinybird for free
item.description: So my azure subscription expired and I ended up losing the function I was using to feed my real-time data on analytics (part of the Transportes Insulares de Tenerife SA analysis I was making). And after some struggle, I decided to move it to a GitHub action. Why? Because the free mins per month were more than enough and because I just needed some script to run on a cron and that script just makes a quest and a post.
